subject: Steroids
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Unless hundreds of writers experienced stunning reversals in the past year regarding their feelings about Mark McGwire, he is not expected to be voted into the Hall of Fame when the announcement is made today at 2 p.m. ET.
snippet: Unless hundreds of writers experienced stunning reversals in the past year regarding their feelings about Mark McGwire, he is not expected to be voted into the Hall of Fame when the announcement is made today at 2 p.m. ET.
